game.name: Liz ~The Tower and the Grimoire~
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After having the magical grimoire stolen, Liz and her mentor Aisha, pursue the thief to a town called Bramach. Sensing danger, Aisha tells Liz to wait for her. However, Liz decides to disregard Aisha’s order, and continues her pursuit of the thief.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After having the magical grimoire stolen, Liz and her mentor Aisha, pursue the thief to a town called Bramach. Sensing danger, Aisha tells Liz to wait for her. However, Liz decides to disregard Aisha’s order, and continues her pursuit of the thief.

reviewHighlights.text: 그림체는 이쁘지만 스탠딩 일러로만 H씬을 때우는 느낌이 들고, 초기작이다보니 편의장치도 많이 부족한편
